[[inst_hl_setret]]
==== HL.SETRET

*Syntax:* hl.setret imm, ->Ra

*Description:* Set Return: set return address (used for function returns).

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_setret.svg[HL.SETRET encoding,width=800]

*Group:* BRU/BRU
